title: Is New York (of All Places) About to Go Red?
description: Two weeks before Election Day, races across the state have gotten too close for Democrats’ comfort.
dc:creator: Michael Barbaro, Stella Tan, Sydney Harper, MJ Davis Lin, Marion Lozano, Dan Powell and Chris Wood
media:description: A televised New York governor’s race debate this week. The race, among others in New York State, are closer than many Democrats expected.
